definition: variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag

sentences.english: Initial screening of animals suspected of having antibiotic residues is conducted using the Swab Test On Premises (STOP).
sentences.chinese: 对怀疑带有抗生素残留的动物的最初检测采用棉签法。

sentences.english: Use . the clea. n side of the swab…
Smudge the outline using a cotton-wool bud .
sentences.chinese: 用一根棉签把轮廓抹花。

sentences.english: I’ve got a Q-tip here in my right hand.
sentences.chinese: 我的右手拿着一个棉签。

sentences.english: So what did Chessor do with those cotton swabs?
sentences.chinese: 那么切索尔老太太拿那些棉签怎么办了？

sentences.english: You should never put a cotten swap[cotton swab] or other object into the ear canal.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该放一根棉签或其他物体到耳道之中。

sentences.english: Objective: To probe into the contamination problems existed in application of small packages of aseptic cotton buds.
sentences.chinese: 探讨小包装无菌消毒棉签使用中存在的污染问题。

sentences.english: But you can use a swab or cloth to clean the outer part of the ear.
sentences.chinese: 但是你可以用棉签或者布把你耳朵外面的部分擦干净。

sentences.english: Swab neck skin with Betadine where thyroid area is.
sentences.chinese: 在颈部甲状腺皮肤上用棉签涂抹碘伏。
